mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article Set regDate = NOW(), updateDAte = NOW(), boardId = #{boardId}, memberId = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.nickname,"탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer, B.name AS extra__boardName FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
